item.title: Provision local development machine
item.description: Sign in to Microsoft Lifecycle Services (LCS): https://lcs.dynamics.com/v2, Click ‘Shared Asset Library’. Click on ‘Downloadable VHD’. Download all the parts of the latest version on your local machine. Double click and execute the ‘*.
